Class Enquiry

java.lang.Object
Enquiry
public class Enquiry extends Object
Represents an enquiry made by an Applicant regarding a Project. Each enquiry can contain a list of messages and corresponding replies.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Enquiry(Applicant applicant, Project pro)
    Constructs a new Enquiry with the specified applicant and project.

  • Constructor Details

    • Enquiry

      public Enquiry(Applicant applicant, Project pro)
      Constructs a new Enquiry with the specified applicant and project. Initializes an empty list of message-reply pairs.
      Parameters:
      applicant - the applicant who sends the enquiry
      pro - the project that the enquiry is about

  • Method Details

    • getMessageReplyPairs

      public List<String[]> getMessageReplyPairs()
      Returns the list of message-reply pairs. Each element is a String array of length 2: [0] = message, [1] = reply.
      Returns:
      the list of message-reply pairs

    • getMessage

      public String getMessage(int index)
      Retrieves the message at a specified index.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the message
      Returns:
      the message if index is valid, otherwise "Invalid index"

    • getReply

      public String getReply(int index)
      Retrieves the reply corresponding to the message at a specified index.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the reply
      Returns:
      the reply if index is valid, otherwise "Invalid index"

    • getProject

      public Project getProject()
      Returns the project associated with this enquiry.
      Returns:
      the project

    • getSender

      public Applicant getSender()
      Returns the applicant who sent this enquiry.
      Returns:
      the sender

    • addMessage

      public void addMessage(String message)
      Adds a new message to the enquiry. The reply is initialized to null.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to add

    • setReply

      public void setReply(int index, String reply)
      Sets the reply for a specific message in the enquiry.
      Parameters:
      index - the index of the message to reply to
      reply - the reply to be set

    • setSender

      public void setSender(Applicant applicant)
      Sets the sender of the enquiry.
      Parameters:
      applicant - the new sender

    • setProject

      public void setProject(Project pro)
      Sets the project associated with the enquiry.
      Parameters:
      pro - the new project
